content:
I totally understand! Losing sleep can definitely impact your focus and productivity. But don't worry, with a good breakfast, a energizing coffee, and some helpful tips, you can still make the most of your day.

Remember to be kind to yourself and don't be too hard on yourself if you don't feel 100% today. Just take it one task at a time, and focus on making progress rather than perfection.

And hey, at least you enjoyed the movie, right? Sometimes, staying up late for a good movie is worth the temporary sleep deprivation.

If you need any more advice or just want to chat, I'm here for you. Otherwise, go crush your day and make it a productive one!
